entry.title: Armenian, Azerbaijani presidents sign border delimitation protocols

media:group.media:title: Armenian, Azerbaijani presidents sign border delimitation protocols
media:group.media:description:
üìç The European Parliament adopted a resolution, condemning human rights abuses and international law violations by Azerbaijan. üìç Nikol Pashinyan and Ilham Aliyev discussed bilateral normalization agenda during a rare meeting in Kazan, Russia. üìç President Vahagn Khachaturyan signed Armenia‚Äôs protocol for the Armenia-Azerbaijan border delimitation yesterday, finalizing legislation approved earlier this week by parliament. üìç Systemic failures in Armenia‚Äôs armed forces: youtu.be/ReCWcoo4ZXE

entry.title: The Art of Animation: Conversation With Aaron Blaise

media:group.media:title: The Art of Animation: Conversation With Aaron Blaise
media:group.media:description:
Renowned animator Aaron Blaise shares his thoughts on the importance of stepping out of your studio as an animator and interacting with the real world through travel, cross-cultural exchange and experiences in nature. As a key figure behind beloved Disney classics like The Lion King and Brother Bear, Aaron emphasizes the power of storytelling and how artists can use new opportunities to share their culture, history and stories with a wider audience. Aaron also reflects on his experience in Armenia and the chance to explore the country‚Äôs growing creative scene.

entry.title: Systemic failures in Armenia's armed forces

media:group.media:title: Systemic failures in Armenia's armed forces
media:group.media:description:
In this week‚Äôs episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian dissects three critical developments shaping Armenia's security landscape: the newly announced defense spending increase, the controversy surrounding non-combat military deaths, and Russia's withdrawal from the Iranian border checkpoint following the CIS summit in Moscow. This episode offers insights into the challenges facing Armenia's military institutions and the shifting regional dynamics affecting the country's security architecture.
